complaint_text: Pichhle 9 dino se main isi issue ke chakkar mein hoon aur ab bahut frustration ho raha hai. Is delay ki wajah se extra paisa aur time dono lag rahe hain aur ghar ke plans bigad gaye hain. Chat support aur phone dono try kiya, phir bhi koi clear solution ya timeline nahi mil rahi. Ye sab dekh kar bahut gussa aur disappointment ho raha hai, please jaldi resolve karo. Mujhe lagta hai time par action nahi liya gaya to future mein bhi aise problems repeat honge.
translated_text_en: I have been facing this issue for around 9 days. An amount of ₹13950 is involved and I have already contacted support 4 time(s) without a clear solution. This delay and confusion is causing a lot of stress and inconvenience.
reply: Aapko hui asuvidha ke liye hum sincerely maafi chahte hain. Hamari payments team transaction check kar rahi hai aur extra amount policy ke hisaab se refund kar diya jayega. Aapke patience aur cooperation ke liye dhanyavaad.

complaint_text: कार्ड से एक बार पेमेंट किया, स्टेटमेंट में डबल एंट्री दिख रही है।
translated_text_en: Customer reports a payment issue issue involving about ₹17010 and wants a quick resolution.
reply: Sorry about the payment problem, we are verifying the transaction and will resolve it quickly.

complaint_text: I have been a regular customer for years but this recent experience has really shaken my trust. I even took time off from work to handle this, which has caused additional loss. I even posted on social media tagging your handle but got only an automated response. This whole situation is extremely frustrating and I expect it to be resolved immediately.
translated_text_en: I have been a regular customer for years but this recent experience has really shaken my trust. I even took time off from work to handle this, which has caused additional loss. I even posted on social media tagging your handle but got only an automated response. This whole situation is extremely frustrating and I expect it to be resolved immediately.
reply: We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. Our payments team is checking the transaction and any extra amount will be refunded as per policy. Thank you for your patience and cooperation.

complaint_text: Can't login to my account, showing number not registered. Kindly fix this soon.
translated_text_en: Can't login to my account, showing number not registered. Kindly fix this soon.
reply: We apologize, please verify your details and we will fix the account issue shortly.

complaint_text: I have been a regular customer for years but this recent experience has really shaken my trust. The amount of ₹1450 is not small for me and having it stuck like this is very stressful. I even posted on social media tagging your handle but got only an automated response. I did not expect such poor service and I am very disappointed. Because of this issue my personal and work life has been disturbed a lot.
translated_text_en: I have been a regular customer for years but this recent experience has really shaken my trust. The amount of ₹1450 is not small for me and having it stuck like this is very stressful. I even posted on social media tagging your handle but got only an automated response. I did not expect such poor service and I am very disappointed. Because of this issue my personal and work life has been disturbed a lot.
reply: We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. We have escalated this to our logistics team and will update you with the correct tracking and resolution timeline soon. Thank you for your patience and cooperation.

complaint_text: For the last 4 days I have been struggling with this problem and I am tired of following up. I have already paid the full amount online and I am not getting proper service in return. I even posted on social media tagging your handle but got only an automated response. This whole situation is extremely frustrating and I expect it to be resolved immediately.
translated_text_en: For the last 4 days I have been struggling with this problem and I am tired of following up. I have already paid the full amount online and I am not getting proper service in return. I even posted on social media tagging your handle but got only an automated response. This whole situation is extremely frustrating and I expect it to be resolved immediately.
reply: We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. Our team is reviewing your account and will share a clear resolution and timeline shortly. Thank you for your patience and cooperation.

complaint_text: मोबाइल नंबर अपडेट नहीं हो रहा, बार‑बार एरर आता है।
translated_text_en: Customer reports a account issue issue involving about ₹290 and wants a quick resolution.
reply: Sorry for the trouble with your account, we are reviewing it and will restore access soon.

complaint_text: मैंने कल ही आपकी सर्विस का इस्तेमाल किया और तब से लगातार दिक्कत आ रही है। मैंने पूरा पेमेंट पहले ही कर दिया है लेकिन बदले में सही सर्विस नहीं मिल रही। मैंने कस्टमर केयर को 3 बार फोन किया लेकिन हर बार सिर्फ़ 24–48 घंटे वेट करने को कहा जाता है। ऐसी सर्विस की मैंने उम्मीद नहीं की थी और मैं काफ़ी निराश हूँ। Is issue ki wajah se kaafi personal aur work life disturb ho gaya hai. Mujhe lagta hai time par action nahi liya gaya to future mein bhi aise problems repeat honge.
translated_text_en: I have been facing this issue for around 15 days. An amount of ₹1780 is involved and I have already contacted support 3 time(s) without a clear solution. This delay and confusion is causing a lot of stress and inconvenience.

complaint_text: Pichhle 15 dino se main isi issue ke chakkar mein hoon aur ab bahut frustration ho raha hai. complaint_text: The service technician promised to come at 10 AM for the AC repair. It is already 4 PM and no one has shown up or even called to inform about the delay. I have wasted my whole day waiting for you.

reply: We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. Our technician is on the way and will reach you in 30 minutes.

complaint_text: मैं पिछले 11 दिनों से इसी समस्या से जूझ रहा हूँ और कोई पक्का समाधान नहीं मिला। ₹8350 की राशि मेरे लिए कम नहीं है और इसका इस तरह अटक जाना बहुत टेंशन दे रहा है। मैंने ऐप से शिकायत और ईमेल दोनों किए, लेकिन बस ऑटोमेटिक जवाब ही मिल रहे हैं। ऐसी सर्विस की मैंने उम्मीद नहीं की थी और मैं काफ़ी निराश हूँ। Is issue ki wajah se kaafi personal aur work life disturb ho gaya hai.

complaint_text: Pichhle 11 dino se main isi issue ke chakkar mein hoon aur ab bahut frustration ho raha hai. Aise service se trust kam ho raha hai, main genuinely expect karta hoon ki isko priority pe solve kiya jaye. Mujhe lagta hai time par action nahi liya gaya to future mein bhi aise problems repeat honge.

translated_text_en: I placed an order on your app 13 days ago and still there is no clear update. Because of this delay I have had to spend extra money and time arranging alternatives. I even posted on social media tagging your handle but got only an automated response. This whole situation is extremely frustrating and I expect it to be resolved immediately.
reply: We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. Our team is reviewing your account and will share a clear resolution and timeline shortly. Thank you for your patience and cooperation.

complaint_text: For the last 2 days I have been struggling with this problem and I am tired of following up. I even took time off from work to handle this, which has caused additional loss. I tried your chat support and helpline but no one is giving a concrete solution or timeline. Please look into this on priority and give me a proper resolution.

complaint_text: Kal hi maine aapki service use ki aur tab se lagatar problem chal rahi hai. ₹2740 mere liye chhoti amount nahi hai aur iska aise atak jana bahut stressful hai. App se ticket raise kiya, email bhi bheja, lekin bas template jaisa reply aa jata hai. Aise service se trust kam ho raha hai, main genuinely expect karta hoon ki isko priority pe solve kiya jaye. Mujhe lagta hai time par action nahi liya gaya to future mein bhi aise problems repeat honge. Mujhe lagta hai time par action nahi liya gaya to future mein bhi aise problems repeat honge.

reply: आपको हुई असुविधा के लिए हम माफ़ी चाहते हैं। हमारी टीम आपके अकाउंट की जांच कर रही है और जल्द ही स्पष्ट समाधान व टाइमलाइन साझा करेगी। आपके धैर्य और सहयोग के लिए धन्यवाद।

complaint_text: Screen pe scratch aur crack dono hai, new piece nahi lag raha. Please jaldi help karo.
translated_text_en: Customer reports a damaged product issue involving about ₹23450 and wants a quick resolution.
reply: Sorry you got a damaged product, we will arrange pickup and refund or replacement.

complaint_text: I tried to withdraw 2000 from an SBI ATM in Indore but the machine showed a timeout. However, the money was deducted from my account. I have the transaction slip and I need this resolved within 24 hours.
translated_text_en: I tried to withdraw 2000 from an SBI ATM in Indore but the machine showed a timeout. However, the money was deducted from my account. I have the transaction slip and I need this resolved within 24 hours.
reply: Transaction reversals usually take 7 days. We have logged your complaint.

complaint_text: I placed an order on your app 7 days ago and still there is no clear update. I have already paid the full amount online and I am not getting proper service in return. I have called customer care 3 times and each time they just ask me to wait 24–48 hours. I feel really let down by your service and want this fixed as soon as possible.
translated_text_en: I placed an order on your app 7 days ago and still there is no clear update. I have already paid the full amount online and I am not getting proper service in return. I have called customer care 3 times and each time they just ask me to wait 24–48 hours. I feel really let down by your service and want this fixed as soon as possible.
reply: We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. We have escalated this to our logistics team and will update you with the correct tracking and resolution timeline soon. Thank you for your patience and cooperation.

complaint_text: Network drops every few minutes, calls not stable. Please help quickly.
translated_text_en: Network drops every few minutes, calls not stable. Please help quickly.
reply: We apologize, please share a screenshot and we will troubleshoot this quickly.

reply: Sorry about the payment problem, we are verifying the transaction and will resolve it quickly.

complaint_text: Maine 8 din pehle aapke app se order kiya tha lekin abhi tak koi proper update nahi mila hai. ₹11340 mere liye chhoti amount nahi hai aur iska aise atak jana bahut stressful hai. Chat support aur phone dono try kiya, phir bhi koi clear solution ya timeline nahi mil rahi. Aise service se trust kam ho raha hai, main genuinely expect karta hoon ki isko priority pe solve kiya jaye. Is issue ki wajah se kaafi personal aur work life disturb ho gaya hai.
translated_text_en: I have been facing this issue for around 8 days. An amount of ₹11340 is involved and I have already contacted support 3 time(s) without a clear solution. This delay and confusion is causing a lot of stress and inconvenience.
reply: Aapko hui asuvidha ke liye hum sincerely maafi chahte hain. Hamari payments team transaction check kar rahi hai aur extra amount policy ke hisaab se refund kar diya jayega. Aapke patience aur cooperation ke liye dhanyavaad.

complaint_text: Maine 14 din pehle aapke app se order kiya tha lekin abhi tak koi proper update nahi mila hai. Maine pehle hi full payment kar diya tha lekin uske badle mein proper service nahi mil rahi. App se ticket raise kiya, email bhi bheja, lekin bas template jaisa reply aa jata hai. Ye sab dekh kar bahut gussa aur disappointment ho raha hai, please jaldi resolve karo.
translated_text_en: I have been facing this issue for around 14 days. An amount of ₹19190 is involved and I have already contacted support 4 time(s) without a clear solution. This delay and confusion is causing a lot of stress and inconvenience.
reply: Aapko hui asuvidha ke liye hum sincerely maafi chahte hain. Humne isko apni logistics team tak escalate kar diya hai aur sahi tracking aur resolution timeline jaldi share karenge. Aapke patience aur cooperation ke liye dhanyavaad.

complaint_text: For the last 8 days I have been struggling with this problem and I am tired of following up. I even took time off from work to handle this, which has caused additional loss. I raised a ticket on the app and followed up by email but only received generic template replies. This whole situation is extremely frustrating and I expect it to be resolved immediately.
translated_text_en: For the last 8 days I have been struggling with this problem and I am tired of following up. I even took time off from work to handle this, which has caused additional loss. I raised a ticket on the app and followed up by email but only received generic template replies. This whole situation is extremely frustrating and I expect it to be resolved immediately.
reply: We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. We have escalated this to our logistics team and will update you with the correct tracking and resolution timeline soon. Thank you for your patience and cooperation.

complaint_text: I ordered X but received completely different item. Kindly fix this soon.
translated_text_en: I ordered X but received completely different item. Kindly fix this soon.
reply: We apologize for the mix‑up and will arrange an easy return with refund.

complaint_text: Kal hi maine aapki service use ki aur tab se lagatar problem chal rahi hai. Maine pehle hi full payment kar diya tha lekin uske badle mein proper service nahi mil rahi. Chat support aur phone dono try kiya, phir bhi koi clear solution ya timeline nahi mil rahi. Aise service se trust kam ho raha hai, main genuinely expect karta hoon ki isko priority pe solve kiya jaye.
translated_text_en: I have been facing this issue for around 4 days. An amount of ₹4430 is involved and I have already contacted support 4 time(s) without a clear solution. This delay and confusion is causing a lot of stress and inconvenience.
reply: Aapko hui asuvidha ke liye hum sincerely maafi chahte hain. Hamari team aapke account ko review kar rahi hai aur jaldi hi clear resolution aur timeline share karegi. Aapke patience aur cooperation ke liye dhanyavaad.

complaint_text: मैंने कल ही आपकी सर्विस का इस्तेमाल किया और तब से लगातार दिक्कत आ रही है। इस देरी की वजह से मुझे अतिरिक्त पैसा और समय दोनों लग रहे हैं। मैंने ऐप से शिकायत और ईमेल दोनों किए, लेकिन बस ऑटोमेटिक जवाब ही मिल रहे हैं। पूरा मामला बहुत परेशान करने वाला है, कृपया इसे तुरंत सुलझाएँ।
translated_text_en: I have been facing this issue for around 13 days. An amount of ₹2340 is involved and I have already contacted support 1 time(s) without a clear solution. This delay and confusion is causing a lot of stress and inconvenience.

translated_text_en: I have been facing this issue for around 13 days. An amount of ₹1220 is involved and I have already contacted support 4 time(s) without a clear solution. This delay and confusion is causing a lot of stress and inconvenience.

complaint_text: मैंने 15 दिन पहले आपके ऐप से ऑर्डर किया था लेकिन अभी तक सही अपडेट नहीं मिला है। मैंने पूरा पेमेंट पहले ही कर दिया है लेकिन बदले में सही सर्विस नहीं मिल रही। मैंने कस्टमर केयर को 1 बार फोन किया लेकिन हर बार सिर्फ़ 24–48 घंटे वेट करने को कहा जाता है। पूरा मामला बहुत परेशान करने वाला है, कृपया इसे तुरंत सुलझाएँ।

reply: आपको हुई असुविधा के लिए हम माफ़ी चाहते हैं। हमने इसे अपनी लॉजिस्टिक्स टीम तक पहुँचा दिया है और सही ट्रैकिंग व समाधान की टाइमलाइन जल्द साझा करेंगे। आपके धैर्य और सहयोग के लिए धन्यवाद।

complaint_text: For the last 4 days I have been struggling with this problem and I am tired of following up. Because of this delay I have had to spend extra money and time arranging alternatives. I have called customer care 3 times and each time they just ask me to wait 24–48 hours. This whole situation is extremely frustrating and I expect it to be resolved immediately.
translated_text_en: For the last 4 days I have been struggling with this problem and I am tired of following up. Because of this delay I have had to spend extra money and time arranging alternatives. I have called customer care 3 times and each time they just ask me to wait 24–48 hours. This whole situation is extremely frustrating and I expect it to be resolved immediately.
reply: We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. We have escalated this to our logistics team and will update you with the correct tracking and resolution timeline soon. Thank you for your patience and cooperation.

complaint_text: My order is still not delivered even after 8 days, please check.
translated_text_en: My order is still not delivered even after 8 days, please check.
reply: We apologize for the delivery issue, our team is coordinating with the courier right now.

Chat support aur phone dono try kiya, phir bhi koi clear solution ya timeline nahi mil rahi. Itni baar follow-up karke bhi result nahi mil raha, ab bas ek final proper resolution chahiye.

reply: आपको हुई असुविधा के लिए हम माफ़ी चाहते हैं। हमने इसे अपनी लॉजिस्टिक्स टीम तक पहुँचा दिया है और सही ट्रैकिंग व समाधान की टाइमलाइन जल्द साझा करेंगे। आपके धैर्य और सहयोग के लिए धन्यवाद।

complaint_text: I used your service yesterday and faced a serious issue that has still not been resolved. The amount of ₹240 is not small for me and having it stuck like this is very stressful. I even posted on social media tagging your handle but got only an automated response. I feel really let down by your service and want this fixed as soon as possible.
translated_text_en: I used your service yesterday and faced a serious issue that has still not been resolved. The amount of ₹240 is not small for me and having it stuck like this is very stressful. I even posted on social media tagging your handle but got only an automated response. I feel really let down by your service and want this fixed as soon as possible.
reply: We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. Our team is reviewing your account and will share a clear resolution and timeline shortly. Thank you for your patience and cooperation.

complaint_text: Jo order kiya tha woh nahi, bilkul alag product bhej diya.
translated_text_en: Customer reports a wrong product issue involving about ₹4840 and wants a quick resolution.
reply: Sorry you received the wrong item, please raise a return so we can replace or refund it.

complaint_text: Pichhle 8 dino se main isi issue ke chakkar mein hoon aur ab bahut frustration ho raha hai. Is delay ki wajah se extra paisa aur time dono lag rahe hain aur ghar ke plans bigad gaye hain. Customer care ko 1 baar call kiya, har baar sirf bola jata hai 24–48 hours wait karo. Aise service se trust kam ho raha hai, main genuinely expect karta hoon ki isko priority pe solve kiya jaye. Mujhe lagta hai time par action nahi liya gaya to future mein bhi aise problems repeat honge.
translated_text_en: I have been facing this issue for around 8 days. An amount of ₹17730 is involved and I have already contacted support 1 time(s) without a clear solution. This delay and confusion is causing a lot of stress and inconvenience.
reply: Aapko hui asuvidha ke liye hum sincerely maafi chahte hain. Hamari payments team transaction check kar rahi hai aur extra amount policy ke hisaab se refund kar diya jayega. Aapke patience aur cooperation ke liye dhanyavaad.

complaint_text: स्क्रीन पर पहले से ही क्रैक है, नया नहीं लग रहा। इसे जल्द से जल्द ठीक करें।
translated_text_en: Customer reports a damaged product issue involving about ₹21870 and wants a quick resolution.
reply: We regret this issue, kindly raise a return and we will process it quickly.

complaint_text: Maine 11 din pehle aapke app se order kiya tha lekin abhi tak koi proper update nahi mila hai. Is delay ki wajah se extra paisa aur time dono lag rahe hain aur ghar ke plans bigad gaye hain. Customer care ko 1 baar call kiya, har baar sirf bola jata hai 24–48 hours wait karo. Itni baar follow-up karke bhi result nahi mil raha, ab bas ek final proper resolution chahiye. Is issue ki wajah se kaafi personal aur work life disturb ho gaya hai.
translated_text_en: I have been facing this issue for around 11 days. An amount of ₹4100 is involved and I have already contacted support 1 time(s) without a clear solution. This delay and confusion is causing a lot of stress and inconvenience.

Ye sab dekh kar bahut gussa aur disappointment ho raha hai, please jaldi resolve karo. Mujhe lagta hai time par action nahi liya gaya to future mein bhi aise problems repeat honge.
translated_text_en: I have been facing this issue for around 11 days. An amount of ₹4860 is involved and I have already contacted support 1 time(s) without a clear solution. This delay and confusion is causing a lot of stress and inconvenience.
reply: Aapko hui asuvidha ke liye hum sincerely maafi chahte hain. Hamari team aapke account ko review kar rahi hai aur jaldi hi clear resolution aur timeline share karegi. Aapke patience aur cooperation ke liye dhanyavaad.

complaint_text: UPI payment failed dikhaya but amount bank se cut ho gaya. Isko jaldi resolve karo please.
translated_text_en: Customer reports a payment issue issue involving about ₹12070 and wants a quick resolution.
reply: We understand your concern, our payments team is checking this and will update you shortly.

complaint_text: मैं पिछले 3 दिनों से इसी समस्या से जूझ रहा हूँ और कोई पक्का समाधान नहीं मिला। इस देरी की वजह से मुझे अतिरिक्त पैसा और समय दोनों लग रहे हैं। मैंने कस्टमर केयर को 2 बार फोन किया लेकिन हर बार सिर्फ़ 24–48 घंटे वेट करने को कहा जाता है। पूरा मामला बहुत परेशान करने वाला है, कृपया इसे तुरंत सुलझाएँ। Mujhe lagta hai time par action nahi liya gaya to future mein bhi aise problems repeat honge.
translated_text_en: I have been facing this issue for around 3 days. An amount of ₹850 is involved and I have already contacted support 2 time(s) without a clear solution. This delay and confusion is causing a lot of stress and inconvenience.
reply: आपको हुई असुविधा के लिए हम माफ़ी चाहते हैं। हमारी टीम आपके अकाउंट की जांच कर रही है और जल्द ही स्पष्ट समाधान व टाइमलाइन साझा करेगी। आपके धैर्य और सहयोग के लिए धन्यवाद।

complaint_text: Pichhle 14 dino se main isi issue ke chakkar mein hoon aur ab bahut frustration ho raha hai. Is delay ki wajah se extra paisa aur time dono lag rahe hain aur ghar ke plans bigad gaye hain. Chat support aur phone dono try kiya, phir bhi koi clear solution ya timeline nahi mil rahi. Itni baar follow-up karke bhi result nahi mil raha, ab bas ek final proper resolution chahiye. Is issue ki wajah se kaafi personal aur work life disturb ho gaya hai.
translated_text_en: I have been facing this issue for around 14 days. An amount of ₹8820 is involved and I have already contacted support 2 time(s) without a clear solution. This delay and confusion is causing a lot of stress and inconvenience.
reply: Aapko hui asuvidha ke liye hum sincerely maafi chahte hain. Hamari payments team transaction check kar rahi hai aur extra amount policy ke hisaab se refund kar diya jayega. Aapke patience aur cooperation ke liye dhanyavaad.

complaint_text: I placed an order on your app 3 days ago and still there is no clear update. The amount of ₹2090 is not small for me and having it stuck like this is very stressful. I even posted on social media tagging your handle but got only an automated response. I did not expect such poor service and I am very disappointed. I feel if this is not fixed in time, such problems will keep repeating in the future.
translated_text_en: I placed an order on your app 3 days ago and still there is no clear update. The amount of ₹2090 is not small for me and having it stuck like this is very stressful. I even posted on social media tagging your handle but got only an automated response. I did not expect such poor service and I am very disappointed. I feel if this is not fixed in time, such problems will keep repeating in the future.
reply: We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. We have escalated this to our logistics team and will update you with the correct tracking and resolution timeline soon. Thank you for your patience and cooperation.

complaint_text: I have been a regular customer for years but this recent experience has really shaken my trust. I have already paid the full amount online and I am not getting proper service in return. I have called customer care 3 times and each time they just ask me to wait 24–48 hours. I feel really let down by your service and want this fixed as soon as possible. Because of this issue my personal and work life has been disturbed a lot.

I have already paid the full amount online and I am not getting proper service in return. I have called customer care 3 times and each time they just ask me to wait 24–48 hours. I feel really let down by your service and want this fixed as soon as possible. Because of this issue my personal and work life has been disturbed a lot.
reply: We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. Our team is reviewing your account and will share a clear resolution and timeline shortly. Thank you for your patience and cooperation.

I feel if this is not fixed in time, such problems will keep repeating in the future.
translated_text_en: I placed an order on your app 13 days ago and still there is no clear update. The amount of ₹7180 is not small for me and having it stuck like this is very stressful. I raised a ticket on the app and followed up by email but only received generic template replies. Please look into this on priority and give me a proper resolution. I feel if this is not fixed in time, such problems will keep repeating in the future.
reply: We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. We have escalated this to our logistics team and will update you with the correct tracking and resolution timeline soon. Thank you for your patience and cooperation.

complaint_text: Size and color both are different from what I selected. Please help quickly.
translated_text_en: Size and color both are different from what I selected. Please help quickly.
reply: We apologize for the mix‑up and will arrange an easy return with refund.

complaint_text: I cancelled the booking last week, still waiting for refund. Kindly fix this soon.
translated_text_en: I cancelled the booking last week, still waiting for refund. Kindly fix this soon.
reply: Apologies, we are following up on your refund and will share a clear timeline soon.

complaint_text: Box theek tha lekin andar product tutा hua mila.
translated_text_en: Customer reports a damaged product issue involving about ₹1920 and wants a quick resolution.
reply: We regret this issue, kindly raise a return and we will process it quickly.

complaint_text: Email/phone change karna hai, option proper kaam nahi kar raha. Kindly fix this soon.
translated_text_en: Email/phone change karna hai, option proper kaam nahi kar raha. Kindly fix this soon.
reply: Sorry for the trouble with your account, we are reviewing it and will restore access soon.

complaint_text: I was charged for a subscription I never authorized. I noticed 1499 INR deducted from my credit card this morning. I want an immediate refund and cancellation of this service.
translated_text_en: I was charged for a subscription I never authorized. I noticed 1499 INR deducted from my credit card this morning. I want an immediate refund and cancellation of this service.
reply: We have cancelled the unauthorized subscription. A refund of 1499 INR has been processed and will reflect in your statement in 5-7 days.

complaint_text: I placed an order on your app 10 days ago and still there is no clear update. I even took time off from work to handle this, which has caused additional loss. I have called customer care 2 times and each time they just ask me to wait 24–48 hours. Please look into this on priority and give me a proper resolution.
translated_text_en: I placed an order on your app 10 days ago and still there is no clear update. I even took time off from work to handle this, which has caused additional loss. I have called customer care 2 times and each time they just ask me to wait 24–48 hours. Please look into this on priority and give me a proper resolution.
reply: We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. Our team is reviewing your account and will share a clear resolution and timeline shortly. Thank you for your patience and cooperation.

complaint_text: Maine 2 din pehle aapke app se order kiya tha lekin abhi tak koi proper update nahi mila hai. Is delay ki wajah se extra paisa aur time dono lag rahe hain aur ghar ke plans bigad gaye hain. Chat support aur phone dono try kiya, phir bhi koi clear solution ya timeline nahi mil rahi. Ye sab dekh kar bahut gussa aur disappointment ho raha hai, please jaldi resolve karo. Is issue ki wajah se kaafi personal aur work life disturb ho gaya hai.
translated_text_en: I have been facing this issue for around 2 days. An amount of ₹90 is involved and I have already contacted support 4 time(s) without a clear solution. This delay and confusion is causing a lot of stress and inconvenience.
reply: Aapko hui asuvidha ke liye hum sincerely maafi chahte hain. Hamari team aapke account ko review kar rahi hai aur jaldi hi clear resolution aur timeline share karegi. Aapke patience aur cooperation ke liye dhanyavaad.

complaint_text: मैंने कल ही आपकी सर्विस का इस्तेमाल किया और तब से लगातार दिक्कत आ रही है। इस देरी की वजह से मुझे अतिरिक्त पैसा और समय दोनों लग रहे हैं। चैट सपोर्ट और हेल्पलाइन दोनों से बात की, फिर भी कोई क्लियर टाइमलाइन नहीं मिल रही। कृपया इसको प्रायोरिटी पर लेकर सही समाधान दें। Is issue ki wajah se kaafi personal aur work life disturb ho gaya hai.
translated_text_en: I have been facing this issue for around 8 days. An amount of ₹3470 is involved and I have already contacted support 1 time(s) without a clear solution. This delay and confusion is causing a lot of stress and inconvenience.
reply: आपको हुई असुविधा के लिए हम माफ़ी चाहते हैं। हमारी टीम आपके अकाउंट की जांच कर रही है और जल्द ही स्पष्ट समाधान व टाइमलाइन साझा करेगी। आपके धैर्य और सहयोग के लिए धन्यवाद।

complaint_text: मेरा अकाउंट अचानक ब्लॉक दिखा रहा है, कुछ भी नहीं कर पा रहा। यह मेरे लिए काफी urgent है।
translated_text_en: Customer reports a account issue issue involving about ₹350 and wants a quick resolution.
reply: We apologize, please verify your details and we will fix the account issue shortly.

complaint_text: मैंने कल ही आपकी सर्विस का इस्तेमाल किया और तब से लगातार दिक्कत आ रही है। ₹1620 की राशि मेरे लिए कम नहीं है और इसका इस तरह अटक जाना बहुत टेंशन दे रहा है। चैट सपोर्ट और हेल्पलाइन दोनों से बात की, फिर भी कोई क्लियर टाइमलाइन नहीं मिल रही। पूरा मामला बहुत परेशान करने वाला है, कृपया इसे तुरंत सुलझाएँ। Mujhe lagta hai time par action nahi liya gaya to future mein bhi aise problems repeat honge.
translated_text_en: I have been facing this issue for around 9 days. An amount of ₹1620 is involved and I have already contacted support 1 time(s) without a clear solution. This delay and confusion is causing a lot of stress and inconvenience.

complaint_text: मैंने कल ही आपकी सर्विस का इस्तेमाल किया और तब से लगातार दिक्कत आ रही है। मैंने पूरा पेमेंट पहले ही कर दिया है लेकिन बदले में सही सर्विस नहीं मिल रही। मैंने कस्टमर केयर को 2 बार फोन किया लेकिन हर बार सिर्फ़ 24–48 घंटे वेट करने को कहा जाता है। ऐसी सर्विस की मैंने उम्मीद नहीं की थी और मैं काफ़ी निराश हूँ। Mujhe lagta hai time par action nahi liya gaya to future mein bhi aise problems repeat honge.
translated_text_en: I have been facing this issue for around 7 days. An amount of ₹3230 is involved and I have already contacted support 2 time(s) without a clear solution. This delay and confusion is causing a lot of stress and inconvenience.

reply: आपको हुई असुविधा के लिए हम माफ़ी चाहते हैं। हमने इसे अपनी लॉजिस्टिक्स टीम तक पहुँचा दिया है और सही ट्रैकिंग व समाधान की टाइमलाइन जल्द साझा करेंगे। आपके धैर्य और सहयोग के लिए धन्यवाद।

complaint_text: Maine 4 din pehle aapke app se order kiya tha lekin abhi tak koi proper update nahi mila hai. Maine pehle hi full payment kar diya tha lekin uske badle mein proper service nahi mil rahi. Customer care ko 3 baar call kiya, har baar sirf bola jata hai 24–48 hours wait karo. Ye sab dekh kar bahut gussa aur disappointment ho raha hai, please jaldi resolve karo. Is issue ki wajah se kaafi personal aur work life disturb ho gaya hai. Mujhe lagta hai time par action nahi liya gaya to future mein bhi aise problems repeat honge.
translated_text_en: I have been facing this issue for around 4 days. An amount of ₹820 is involved and I have already contacted support 3 time(s) without a clear solution. This delay and confusion is causing a lot of stress and inconvenience.
reply: Aapko hui asuvidha ke liye hum sincerely maafi chahte hain. Hamari team aapke account ko review kar rahi hai aur jaldi hi clear resolution aur timeline share karegi. Aapke patience aur cooperation ke liye dhanyavaad.

complaint_text: For the last 7 days I have been struggling with this problem and I am tired of following up. Because of this delay I have had to spend extra money and time arranging alternatives. I tried your chat support and helpline but no one is giving a concrete solution or timeline. Please look into this on priority and give me a proper resolution. Because of this issue my personal and work life has been disturbed a lot.
translated_text_en: For the last 7 days I have been struggling with this problem and I am tired of following up. Because of this delay I have had to spend extra money and time arranging alternatives. I tried your chat support and helpline but no one is giving a concrete solution or timeline. Please look into this on priority and give me a proper resolution. Because of this issue my personal and work life has been disturbed a lot.
reply: We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. Our payments team is checking the transaction and any extra amount will be refunded as per policy. Thank you for your patience and cooperation.

complaint_text: Account suddenly blocked dikha raha hai, UPI bilkul kaam nahi kar raha.
translated_text_en: Customer reports a account issue issue involving about ₹240 and wants a quick resolution.
reply: We apologize, please verify your details and we will fix the account issue shortly.

complaint_text: Refund promise hua tha but abhi tak account mein nahi aaya.
translated_text_en: Refund promise hua tha but abhi tak account mein nahi aaya.
reply: Apologies, we are following up on your refund and will share a clear timeline soon.

reply: We regret the experience; our manager will call you shortly.

complaint_text: मैंने 12 दिन पहले आपके ऐप से ऑर्डर किया था लेकिन अभी तक सही अपडेट नहीं मिला है। मैंने पूरा पेमेंट पहले ही कर दिया है लेकिन बदले में सही सर्विस नहीं मिल रही। मैंने कस्टमर केयर को 3 बार फोन किया लेकिन हर बार सिर्फ़ 24–48 घंटे वेट करने को कहा जाता है। पूरा मामला बहुत परेशान करने वाला है, कृपया इसे तुरंत सुलझाएँ। Mujhe lagta hai time par action nahi liya gaya to future mein bhi aise problems repeat honge.
translated_text_en: I have been facing this issue for around 12 days. An amount of ₹3920 is involved and I have already contacted support 3 time(s) without a clear solution. This delay and confusion is causing a lot of stress and inconvenience.
reply: आपको हुई असुविधा के लिए हम माफ़ी चाहते हैं। हमारी टीम आपके अकाउंट की जांच कर रही है और जल्द ही स्पष्ट समाधान व टाइमलाइन साझा करेगी। आपके धैर्य और सहयोग के लिए धन्यवाद।

complaint_text: Bottle leak ho gayi, pura packet gila ho gaya. Please jaldi help karo.
translated_text_en: Customer reports a damaged product issue involving about ₹9750 and wants a quick resolution.
reply: Sorry you got a damaged product, we will arrange pickup and refund or replacement.

complaint_text: I used your service yesterday and faced a serious issue that has still not been resolved. The amount of ₹3490 is not small for me and having it stuck like this is very stressful. I raised a ticket on the app and followed up by email but only received generic template replies. I feel really let down by your service and want this fixed as soon as possible. I feel if this is not fixed in time, such problems will keep repeating in the future.
translated_text_en: I used your service yesterday and faced a serious issue that has still not been resolved. The amount of ₹3490 is not small for me and having it stuck like this is very stressful. I raised a ticket on the app and followed up by email but only received generic template replies. I feel really let down by your service and want this fixed as soon as possible. I feel if this is not fixed in time, such problems will keep repeating in the future.
reply: We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. We have escalated this to our logistics team and will update you with the correct tracking and resolution timeline soon. Thank you for your patience and cooperation.

complaint_text: मैं पिछले 8 दिनों से इसी समस्या से जूझ रहा हूँ और कोई पक्का समाधान नहीं मिला। मैंने पूरा पेमेंट पहले ही कर दिया है लेकिन बदले में सही सर्विस नहीं मिल रही। मैंने ऐप से शिकायत और ईमेल दोनों किए, लेकिन बस ऑटोमेटिक जवाब ही मिल रहे हैं। कृपया इसको प्रायोरिटी पर लेकर सही समाधान दें। Is issue ki wajah se kaafi personal aur work life disturb ho gaya hai.
translated_text_en: I have been facing this issue for around 8 days. An amount of ₹1820 is involved and I have already contacted support 4 time(s) without a clear solution. This delay and confusion is causing a lot of stress and inconvenience.
reply: आपको हुई असुविधा के लिए हम माफ़ी चाहते हैं। हमने इसे अपनी लॉजिस्टिक्स टीम तक पहुँचा दिया है और सही ट्रैकिंग व समाधान की टाइमलाइन जल्द साझा करेंगे। आपके धैर्य और सहयोग के लिए धन्यवाद।

complaint_text: मैंने कुछ और मंगवाया था, बॉक्स में पूरी तरह दूसरा सामान है। इसे जल्द से जल्द ठीक करें।
translated_text_en: Customer reports a wrong product issue involving about ₹410 and wants a quick resolution.
reply: We apologize for the mix‑up and will arrange an easy return with refund.

complaint_text: Network drops every few minutes, calls not stable. Please help quickly.
translated_text_en: Network drops every few minutes, calls not stable. Please help quickly.
reply: Sorry for the technical issue, our team is checking this and will fix it soon.

complaint_text: कार्ड से एक बार पेमेंट किया, स्टेटमेंट में डबल एंट्री दिख रही है।
translated_text_en: Customer reports a payment issue issue involving about ₹10210 and wants a quick resolution.
reply: We understand your concern, our payments team is checking this and will update you shortly.

complaint_text: Photo mein kuch aur tha, parcel mein kuch aur nikla. Isko jaldi resolve karo please.
translated_text_en: Customer reports a wrong product issue involving about ₹3230 and wants a quick resolution.
reply: We apologize for the mix‑up and will arrange an easy return with refund.

complaint_text: I placed an order on your app 6 days ago and still there is no clear update. I even took time off from work to handle this, which has caused additional loss. I tried your chat support and helpline but no one is giving a concrete solution or timeline. This whole situation is extremely frustrating and I expect it to be resolved immediately. I feel if this is not fixed in time, such problems will keep repeating in the future.
translated_text_en: I placed an order on your app 6 days ago and still there is no clear update. I even took time off from work to handle this, which has caused additional loss. I tried your chat support and helpline but no one is giving a concrete solution or timeline. This whole situation is extremely frustrating and I expect it to be resolved immediately. I feel if this is not fixed in time, such problems will keep repeating in the future.
reply: We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. Our team is reviewing your account and will share a clear resolution and timeline shortly. Thank you for your patience and cooperation.

complaint_text: मैंने 15 दिन पहले आपके ऐप से ऑर्डर किया था लेकिन अभी तक सही अपडेट नहीं मिला है। ₹3380 की राशि मेरे लिए कम नहीं है और इसका इस तरह अटक जाना बहुत टेंशन दे रहा है। मैंने ऐप से शिकायत और ईमेल दोनों किए, लेकिन बस ऑटोमेटिक जवाब ही मिल रहे हैं। कृपया इसको प्रायोरिटी पर लेकर सही समाधान दें। Is issue ki wajah se kaafi personal aur work life disturb ho gaya hai.

complaint_text: The delivery executive was extremely rude and refused to come to the third floor. He started shouting when I asked him to use the lift. This kind of behavior is not expected from a professional service provider in Chennai.
translated_text_en: The delivery executive was extremely rude and refused to come to the third floor. He started shouting when I asked him to use the lift. This kind of behavior is not expected from a professional service provider in Chennai.
reply: We apologize for the behavior of our partner. We are taking strict action against the individual involved.

complaint_text: Pichhle 3 dino se main isi issue ke chakkar mein hoon aur ab bahut frustration ho raha hai. ₹1490 mere liye chhoti amount nahi hai aur iska aise atak jana bahut stressful hai. Customer care ko 2 baar call kiya, har baar sirf bola jata hai 24–48 hours wait karo. Ye sab dekh kar bahut gussa aur disappointment ho raha hai, please jaldi resolve karo. Mujhe lagta hai time par action nahi liya gaya to future mein bhi aise problems repeat honge. Mujhe lagta hai time par action nahi liya gaya to future mein bhi aise problems repeat honge.
translated_text_en: I have been facing this issue for around 3 days. An amount of ₹1490 is involved and I have already contacted support 2 time(s) without a clear solution. This delay and confusion is causing a lot of stress and inconvenience.
reply: Aapko hui asuvidha ke liye hum sincerely maafi chahte hain. Humne isko apni logistics team tak escalate kar diya hai aur sahi tracking aur resolution timeline jaldi share karenge. Aapke patience aur cooperation ke liye dhanyavaad.

complaint_text: मैंने कल ही आपकी सर्विस का इस्तेमाल किया और तब से लगातार दिक्कत आ रही है। इस देरी की वजह से मुझे अतिरिक्त पैसा और समय दोनों लग रहे हैं। मैंने ऐप से शिकायत और ईमेल दोनों किए, लेकिन बस ऑटोमेटिक जवाब ही मिल रहे हैं। कृपया इसको प्रायोरिटी पर लेकर सही समाधान दें। Mujhe lagta hai time par action nahi liya gaya to future mein bhi aise problems repeat honge.

translated_text_en: Chat support bas same copy paste reply bhej raha hai. Please help quickly.

complaint_text: Maine 13 din pehle aapke app se order kiya tha lekin abhi tak koi proper update nahi mila hai. Is delay ki wajah se extra paisa aur time dono lag rahe hain aur ghar ke plans bigad gaye hain. Customer care ko 4 baar call kiya, har baar sirf bola jata hai 24–48 hours wait karo. Ye sab dekh kar bahut gussa aur disappointment ho raha hai, please jaldi resolve karo.

complaint_text: Maine 13 din pehle aapke app se order kiya tha lekin abhi tak koi proper update nahi mila hai. ₹2680 mere liye chhoti amount nahi hai aur iska aise atak jana bahut stressful hai. complaint_text: Got damaged item, I want quick replacement please. Please help quickly.

I feel if this is not fixed in time, such problems will keep repeating in the future.
translated_text_en: I have been a regular customer for years but this recent experience has really shaken my trust. The amount of ₹950 is not small for me and having it stuck like this is very stressful. I tried your chat support and helpline but no one is giving a concrete solution or timeline. This whole situation is extremely frustrating and I expect it to be resolved immediately. I feel if this is not fixed in time, such problems will keep repeating in the future.
reply: We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. We have escalated this to our logistics team and will update you with the correct tracking and resolution timeline soon. Thank you for your patience and cooperation.

complaint_text: Chat support sirf copy paste reply bhej raha hai, koi real help nahi.
translated_text_en: Customer reports a customer service issue issue involving about ₹3650 and wants a quick resolution.
reply: We apologize for the poor support, we are assigning this to a senior agent now.

complaint_text: मैंने 3 दिन पहले आपके ऐप से ऑर्डर किया था लेकिन अभी तक सही अपडेट नहीं मिला है। इस देरी की वजह से मुझे अतिरिक्त पैसा और समय दोनों लग रहे हैं। मैंने कस्टमर केयर को 4 बार फोन किया लेकिन हर बार सिर्फ़ 24–48 घंटे वेट करने को कहा जाता है। कृपया इसको प्रायोरिटी पर लेकर सही समाधान दें। Is issue ki wajah se kaafi personal aur work life disturb ho gaya hai. Mujhe lagta hai time par action nahi liya gaya to future mein bhi aise problems repeat honge.
translated_text_en: I have been facing this issue for around 3 days. An amount of ₹1590 is involved and I have already contacted support 4 time(s) without a clear solution. This delay and confusion is causing a lot of stress and inconvenience.
reply: आपको हुई असुविधा के लिए हम माफ़ी चाहते हैं। हमारी पेमेंट टीम ट्रांज़ैक्शन की जांच कर रही है और अतिरिक्त राशि पॉलिसी के अनुसार रिफंड कर दी जाएगी। आपके धैर्य और सहयोग के लिए धन्यवाद।

complaint_text: Return pickup ho gaya par refund abhi tak account mein nahi aaya.

reply: We are sorry for the delay, your refund is being processed on priority.

complaint_text: I have been a regular customer for years but this recent experience has really shaken my trust. Please look into this on priority and give me a proper resolution. I feel if this is not fixed in time, such problems will keep repeating in the future.

complaint_text: मेरे बैंक अकाउंट से दो बार पैसे कट गए एक ही ट्रांजेक्शन के लिए। मैंने १००० रुपये का ग्रोसरी आर्डर किया था पर मैसेज दो बार आया। कृपया फालतू पैसे वापस करें।
translated_text_en: Money was deducted twice from my bank account for the same transaction. I ordered groceries worth 1000 rupees but received the message twice. Please refund the extra money.
reply: We have identified the duplicate transaction. The second deduction of 1000 INR will be credited back to your source account within 5 days.

complaint_text: मैंने कल ही आपकी सर्विस का इस्तेमाल किया और तब से लगातार दिक्कत आ रही है। ₹740 की राशि मेरे लिए कम नहीं है और इसका इस तरह अटक जाना बहुत टेंशन दे रहा है। चैट सपोर्ट और हेल्पलाइन दोनों से बात की, फिर भी कोई क्लियर टाइमलाइन नहीं मिल रही। ऐसी सर्विस की मैंने उम्मीद नहीं की थी और मैं काफ़ी निराश हूँ।
translated_text_en: I have been facing this issue for around 14 days. An amount of ₹740 is involved and I have already contacted support 3 time(s) without a clear solution. This delay and confusion is causing a lot of stress and inconvenience.

complaint_text: कार्ड से एक बार पेमेंट किया, स्टेटमेंट में डबल एंट्री दिख रही है। कृपया जल्दी मदद करें।
translated_text_en: Customer reports a payment issue issue involving about ₹2050 and wants a quick resolution.
reply: Sorry about the payment problem, we are verifying the transaction and will resolve it quickly.

complaint_text: I ordered a laptop from your site but received a box of soaps. This is unacceptable and I demand an immediate refund. I've been calling customer care for hours with no response.
translated_text_en: I ordered a laptop from your site but received a box of soaps. This is unacceptable and I demand an immediate refund. I've been calling customer care for hours with no response.
reply: We apologize for this experience. We have initiated a refund and are investigating the logistics partner.

complaint_text: Maine 11 din pehle aapke app se order kiya tha lekin abhi tak koi proper update nahi mila hai. Maine pehle hi full payment kar diya tha lekin uske badle mein proper service nahi mil rahi. Chat support aur phone dono try kiya, phir bhi koi clear solution ya timeline nahi mil rahi. Ye sab dekh kar bahut gussa aur disappointment ho raha hai, please jaldi resolve karo.
translated_text_en: I have been facing this issue for around 11 days. An amount of ₹1390 is involved and I have already contacted support 2 time(s) without a clear solution. This delay and confusion is causing a lot of stress and inconvenience.
reply: Aapko hui asuvidha ke liye hum sincerely maafi chahte hain. Hamari team aapke account ko review kar rahi hai aur jaldi hi clear resolution aur timeline share karegi. Aapke patience aur cooperation ke liye dhanyavaad.

complaint_text: I placed an order on your app 14 days ago and still there is no clear update. I even took time off from work to handle this, which has caused additional loss. I even posted on social media tagging your handle but got only an automated response. This whole situation is extremely frustrating and I expect it to be resolved immediately.

complaint_text: I placed an order on your app 14 days ago and still there is no clear update. I even took time off from work to handle this, which has caused additional loss. I feel if this is not fixed in time, such problems will keep repeating in the future.

complaint_text: Kal hi maine aapki service use ki aur tab se lagatar problem chal rahi hai. ₹4400 mere liye chhoti amount nahi hai aur iska aise atak jana bahut stressful hai. Is issue ki wajah se kaafi personal aur work life disturb ho gaya hai. Mujhe lagta hai time par action nahi liya gaya to future mein bhi aise problems repeat honge.

Because of this issue my personal and work life has been disturbed a lot.
translated_text_en: I placed an order on your app 10 days ago and still there is no clear update. The amount of ₹2280 is not small for me and having it stuck like this is very stressful. I even posted on social media tagging your handle but got only an automated response. Please look into this on priority and give me a proper resolution. Because of this issue my personal and work life has been disturbed a lot.
reply: We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. We have escalated this to our logistics team and will update you with the correct tracking and resolution timeline soon. Thank you for your patience and cooperation.

complaint_text: For the last 2 days I have been struggling with this problem and I am tired of following up. The amount of ₹3040 is not small for me and having it stuck like this is very stressful. I raised a ticket on the app and followed up by email but only received generic template replies. Please look into this on priority and give me a proper resolution. I feel if this is not fixed in time, such problems will keep repeating in the future.
translated_text_en: For the last 2 days I have been struggling with this problem and I am tired of following up. The amount of ₹3040 is not small for me and having it stuck like this is very stressful. I raised a ticket on the app and followed up by email but only received generic template replies. Please look into this on priority and give me a proper resolution. I feel if this is not fixed in time, such problems will keep repeating in the future.
reply: We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. Our payments team is checking the transaction and any extra amount will be refunded as per policy. Thank you for your patience and cooperation.

complaint_text: इंदौर में मेरा मोबाइल रिचार्ज अभी तक नहीं हुआ जबकि पैसे कट गए हैं। मैंने अपनी माँ के लिए रिचार्ज किया था ताकि बात हो सके। कृपया तुरंत सक्रिय करें।
translated_text_en: My mobile recharge in Indore has not happened yet even though the money was deducted. I recharged for my mother so we could talk. Please activate immediately.
reply: Recharge safal ho gaya hai, kripya check karein.

complaint_text: The quality of the saree I received is pathetic. It looks nothing like the picture shown on the app and the fabric is torn in several places. I want an immediate replacement or full refund.
translated_text_en: The quality of the saree I received is pathetic. It looks nothing like the picture shown on the app and the fabric is torn in several places. I want an immediate replacement or full refund.
reply: We apologize for the damaged product. A return pickup has been scheduled for tomorrow morning.

complaint_text: I placed an order on your app 8 days ago and still there is no clear update. I have already paid the full amount online and I am not getting proper service in return. I even posted on social media tagging your handle but got only an automated response. I did not expect such poor service and I am very disappointed. Because of this issue my personal and work life has been disturbed a lot. I feel if this is not fixed in time, such problems will keep repeating in the future.
translated_text_en: I placed an order on your app 8 days ago and still there is no clear update. I have already paid the full amount online and I am not getting proper service in return. I even posted on social media tagging your handle but got only an automated response. I did not expect such poor service and I am very disappointed. Because of this issue my personal and work life has been disturbed a lot. I feel if this is not fixed in time, such problems will keep repeating in the future.
reply: We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. We have escalated this to our logistics team and will update you with the correct tracking and resolution timeline soon. Thank you for your patience and cooperation.

complaint_text: For the last 10 days I have been struggling with this problem and I am tired of following up. Because of this delay I have had to spend extra money and time arranging alternatives. I have called customer care 3 times and each time they just ask me to wait 24–48 hours. I feel really let down by your service and want this fixed as soon as possible. I feel if this is not fixed in time, such problems will keep repeating in the future. I feel if this is not fixed in time, such problems will keep repeating in the future.
translated_text_en: For the last 10 days I have been struggling with this problem and I am tired of following up. Because of this delay I have had to spend extra money and time arranging alternatives. I have called customer care 3 times and each time they just ask me to wait 24–48 hours. I feel really let down by your service and want this fixed as soon as possible. I feel if this is not fixed in time, such problems will keep repeating in the future. I feel if this is not fixed in time, such problems will keep repeating in the future.
reply: We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. Our payments team is checking the transaction and any extra amount will be refunded as per policy. Thank you for your patience and cooperation.

complaint_text: मैं पिछले 7 दिनों से इसी समस्या से जूझ रहा हूँ और कोई पक्का समाधान नहीं मिला। ₹4260 की राशि मेरे लिए कम नहीं है और इसका इस तरह अटक जाना बहुत टेंशन दे रहा है। मैंने ऐप से शिकायत और ईमेल दोनों किए, लेकिन बस ऑटोमेटिक जवाब ही मिल रहे हैं। पूरा मामला बहुत परेशान करने वाला है, कृपया इसे तुरंत सुलझाएँ। Is issue ki wajah se kaafi personal aur work life disturb ho gaya hai.
translated_text_en: I have been facing this issue for around 7 days. An amount of ₹4260 is involved and I have already contacted support 2 time(s) without a clear solution. This delay and confusion is causing a lot of stress and inconvenience.
reply: आपको हुई असुविधा के लिए हम माफ़ी चाहते हैं। हमारी टीम आपके अकाउंट की जांच कर रही है और जल्द ही स्पष्ट समाधान व टाइमलाइन साझा करेगी। आपके धैर्य और सहयोग के लिए धन्यवाद।

complaint_text: Kal hi maine aapki service use ki aur tab se lagatar problem chal rahi hai. Is delay ki wajah se extra paisa aur time dono lag rahe hain aur ghar ke plans bigad gaye hain. App se ticket raise kiya, email bhi bheja, lekin bas template jaisa reply aa jata hai. Aise service se trust kam ho raha hai, main genuinely expect karta hoon ki isko priority pe solve kiya jaye. Mujhe lagta hai time par action nahi liya gaya to future mein bhi aise problems repeat honge.
translated_text_en: I have been facing this issue for around 9 days. An amount of ₹3740 is involved and I have already contacted support 1 time(s) without a clear solution. This delay and confusion is causing a lot of stress and inconvenience.
reply: Aapko hui asuvidha ke liye hum sincerely maafi chahte hain. Humne isko apni logistics team tak escalate kar diya hai aur sahi tracking aur resolution timeline jaldi share karenge. Aapke patience aur cooperation ke liye dhanyavaad.

complaint_text: मैंने 3 दिन पहले आपके ऐप से ऑर्डर किया था लेकिन अभी तक सही अपडेट नहीं मिला है। इस देरी की वजह से मुझे अतिरिक्त पैसा और समय दोनों लग रहे हैं। चैट सपोर्ट और हेल्पलाइन दोनों से बात की, फिर भी कोई क्लियर टाइमलाइन नहीं मिल रही। ऐसी सर्विस की मैंने उम्मीद नहीं की थी और मैं काफ़ी निराश हूँ। Is issue ki wajah se kaafi personal aur work life disturb ho gaya hai.
translated_text_en: I have been facing this issue for around 3 days. An amount of ₹530 is involved and I have already contacted support 1 time(s) without a clear solution. This delay and confusion is causing a lot of stress and inconvenience.

complaint_text: Maine 3 din pehle aapke app se order kiya tha lekin abhi tak koi proper update nahi mila hai. ₹6160 mere liye chhoti amount nahi hai aur iska aise atak jana bahut stressful hai. App se ticket raise kiya, email bhi bheja, lekin bas template jaisa reply aa jata hai. Aise service se trust kam ho raha hai, main genuinely expect karta hoon ki isko priority pe solve kiya jaye.

I feel if this is not fixed in time, such problems will keep repeating in the future.

complaint_text: UPI transaction fail ho gaya lekin paise cut gaye hain. Shopkeeper keh raha hai usse paise nahi mile. Please mera paisa wapas kijiye bahut dikkat ho rahi hai.
translated_text_en: The UPI transaction failed but the money has been deducted. The shopkeeper says he didn't receive the money. Please return my money, I am facing a lot of trouble.
reply: Transaction details check kar rahe hain. 3-5 working days mein refund aa jayega.

reply: आपको हुई असुविधा के लिए हम माफ़ी चाहते हैं। हमारी टीम आपके अकाउंट की जांच कर रही है और जल्द ही स्पष्ट समाधान व टाइमलाइन साझा करेगी। आपके धैर्य और सहयोग के लिए धन्यवाद।

Mujhe lagta hai time par action nahi liya gaya to future mein bhi aise problems repeat honge.

complaint_text: मैंने 3 दिन पहले आपके ऐप से ऑर्डर किया था लेकिन अभी तक सही अपडेट नहीं मिला है। ₹18430 की राशि मेरे लिए कम नहीं है और इसका इस तरह अटक जाना बहुत टेंशन दे रहा है। मैंने ऐप से शिकायत और ईमेल दोनों किए, लेकिन बस ऑटोमेटिक जवाब ही मिल रहे हैं। ऐसी सर्विस की मैंने उम्मीद नहीं की थी और मैं काफ़ी निराश हूँ।
translated_text_en: I have been facing this issue for around 3 days. An amount of ₹18430 is involved and I have already contacted support 3 time(s) without a clear solution. This delay and confusion is causing a lot of stress and inconvenience.
reply: आपको हुई असुविधा के लिए हम माफ़ी चाहते हैं। हमने इसे अपनी लॉजिस्टिक्स टीम तक पहुँचा दिया है और सही ट्रैकिंग व समाधान की टाइमलाइन जल्द साझा करेंगे। आपके धैर्य और सहयोग के लिए धन्यवाद।

complaint_text: Kal hi maine aapki service use ki aur tab se lagatar problem chal rahi hai. Maine pehle hi full payment kar diya tha lekin uske badle mein proper service nahi mil rahi. Customer care ko 4 baar call kiya, har baar sirf bola jata hai 24–48 hours wait karo. Itni baar follow-up karke bhi result nahi mil raha, ab bas ek final proper resolution chahiye. Is issue ki wajah se kaafi personal aur work life disturb ho gaya hai.
translated_text_en: I have been facing this issue for around 7 days. An amount of ₹12940 is involved and I have already contacted support 4 time(s) without a clear solution. This delay and confusion is causing a lot of stress and inconvenience.
reply: Aapko hui asuvidha ke liye hum sincerely maafi chahte hain. Hamari payments team transaction check kar rahi hai aur extra amount policy ke hisaab se refund kar diya jayega. Aapke patience aur cooperation ke liye dhanyavaad.

complaint_text: I placed an order on your app 4 days ago and still there is no clear update. Because of this delay I have had to spend extra money and time arranging alternatives. I tried your chat support and helpline but no one is giving a concrete solution or timeline. This whole situation is extremely frustrating and I expect it to be resolved immediately. Because of this issue my personal and work life has been disturbed a lot. I feel if this is not fixed in time, such problems will keep repeating in the future.
translated_text_en: I placed an order on your app 4 days ago and still there is no clear update. Because of this delay I have had to spend extra money and time arranging alternatives. I tried your chat support and helpline but no one is giving a concrete solution or timeline. This whole situation is extremely frustrating and I expect it to be resolved immediately. Because of this issue my personal and work life has been disturbed a lot. I feel if this is not fixed in time, such problems will keep repeating in the future.
reply: We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. Our payments team is checking the transaction and any extra amount will be refunded as per policy. Thank you for your patience and cooperation.

complaint_text: I placed an order on your app 10 days ago and still there is no clear update. Because of this delay I have had to spend extra money and time arranging alternatives. I even posted on social media tagging your handle but got only an automated response. This whole situation is extremely frustrating and I expect it to be resolved immediately.
translated_text_en: I placed an order on your app 10 days ago and still there is no clear update. Because of this delay I have had to spend extra money and time arranging alternatives. I even posted on social media tagging your handle but got only an automated response. This whole situation is extremely frustrating and I expect it to be resolved immediately.
reply: We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. We have escalated this to our logistics team and will update you with the correct tracking and resolution timeline soon. Thank you for your patience and cooperation.

complaint_text: डिलीवरी बॉय का व्यवहार बहुत ही खराब था। उसने मुझसे एक्स्ट्रा पैसे मांगे और जब मैंने मना किया तो चिल्लाने लगा। आपके पास ऐसे बदतमीज लोग काम कैसे कर रहे हैं? मुझे इसकी शिकायत दर्ज करानी है।
translated_text_en: The delivery boy's behavior was very bad. He asked for extra money from me and when I refused, he started shouting. How are such rude people working for you? I want to register a complaint.
reply: हम इस घटना के लिए क्षमा चाहते हैं। संबंधित डिलीवरी पार्टनर के खिलाफ कड़ी कार्रवाई की जाएगी।

reply: आपको हुई असुविधा के लिए हम माफ़ी चाहते हैं। हमारी टीम आपके अकाउंट की जांच कर रही है और जल्द ही स्पष्ट समाधान व टाइमलाइन साझा करेगी। आपके धैर्य और सहयोग के लिए धन्यवाद।

complaint_text: मैंने 6 दिन पहले आपके ऐप से ऑर्डर किया था लेकिन अभी तक सही अपडेट नहीं मिला है। मैंने पूरा पेमेंट पहले ही कर दिया है लेकिन बदले में सही सर्विस नहीं मिल रही। मैंने ऐप से शिकायत और ईमेल दोनों किए, लेकिन बस ऑटोमेटिक जवाब ही मिल रहे हैं। पूरा मामला बहुत परेशान करने वाला है, कृपया इसे तुरंत सुलझाएँ। Mujhe lagta hai time par action nahi liya gaya to future mein bhi aise problems repeat honge.

complaint_text: I used your service yesterday and faced a serious issue that has still not been resolved. I even took time off from work to handle this, which has caused additional loss. I have called customer care 4 times and each time they just ask me to wait 24–48 hours. Please look into this on priority and give me a proper resolution. I feel if this is not fixed in time, such problems will keep repeating in the future.

I have called customer care 4 times and each time they just ask me to wait 24–48 hours. Please look into this on priority and give me a proper resolution. I feel if this is not fixed in time, such problems will keep repeating in the future.
reply: We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. We have escalated this to our logistics team and will update you with the correct tracking and resolution timeline soon. Thank you for your patience and cooperation.

Is issue ki wajah se kaafi personal aur work life disturb ho gaya hai.

complaint_text: Payment got deducted but order is not showing, please fix this. This is very urgent for me.
translated_text_en: Payment got deducted but order is not showing, please fix this. This is very urgent for me.
reply: Sorry about the payment problem, we are verifying the transaction and will resolve it quickly.

complaint_text: I paid the bill but your app still shows payment pending. This is very urgent for me.
translated_text_en: I paid the bill but your app still shows payment pending. This is very urgent for me.
reply: Sorry about the payment problem, we are verifying the transaction and will resolve it quickly.

complaint_text: Pichhle 13 dino se main isi issue ke chakkar mein hoon aur ab bahut frustration ho raha hai. ₹4690 mere liye chhoti amount nahi hai aur iska aise atak jana bahut stressful hai. Chat support aur phone dono try kiya, phir bhi koi clear solution ya timeline nahi mil rahi. Itni baar follow-up karke bhi result nahi mil raha, ab bas ek final proper resolution chahiye. Is issue ki wajah se kaafi personal aur work life disturb ho gaya hai.
translated_text_en: I have been facing this issue for around 13 days. An amount of ₹4690 is involved and I have already contacted support 4 time(s) without a clear solution. This delay and confusion is causing a lot of stress and inconvenience.
reply: Aapko hui asuvidha ke liye hum sincerely maafi chahte hain. Humne isko apni logistics team tak escalate kar diya hai aur sahi tracking aur resolution timeline jaldi share karenge. Aapke patience aur cooperation ke liye dhanyavaad.

complaint_text: Bill pay kar diya fir bhi app pending payment dikha raha hai.
translated_text_en: Customer reports a payment issue issue involving about ₹7730 and wants a quick resolution.
reply: We understand your concern, our payments team is checking this and will update you shortly.

complaint_text: Return pickup ho gaya lekin refund status stuck on processing. Please help quickly.
translated_text_en: Return pickup ho gaya lekin refund status stuck on processing. Please help quickly.
reply: Apologies, we are following up on your refund and will share a clear timeline soon.

complaint_text: Video buffering ho raha hai even on good Wi‑Fi. Kindly fix this soon.
translated_text_en: Video buffering ho raha hai even on good Wi‑Fi. Kindly fix this soon.
reply: Sorry for the technical issue, our team is checking this and will fix it soon.

complaint_text: Kal hi maine aapki service use ki aur tab se lagatar problem chal rahi hai. Is delay ki wajah se extra paisa aur time dono lag rahe hain aur ghar ke plans bigad gaye hain. Customer care ko 1 baar call kiya, har baar sirf bola jata hai 24–48 hours wait karo. Aise service se trust kam ho raha hai, main genuinely expect karta hoon ki isko priority pe solve kiya jaye. Is issue ki wajah se kaafi personal aur work life disturb ho gaya hai.
translated_text_en: I have been facing this issue for around 5 days. An amount of ₹15170 is involved and I have already contacted support 1 time(s) without a clear solution. This delay and confusion is causing a lot of stress and inconvenience.
reply: Aapko hui asuvidha ke liye hum sincerely maafi chahte hain. Hamari payments team transaction check kar rahi hai aur extra amount policy ke hisaab se refund kar diya jayega. Aapke patience aur cooperation ke liye dhanyavaad.

complaint_text: बिल पे किया फिर भी ऐप में पेंडिंग दिखा रहा है।
translated_text_en: Customer reports a payment issue issue involving about ₹6330 and wants a quick resolution.
reply: We understand your concern, our payments team is checking this and will update you shortly.

complaint_text: कस्टमर केयर का कोई भी व्यक्ति कॉल नहीं उठा रहा है। पिछले 2 घंटों से मैं संगीत सुन रहा हूँ। क्या कोई ज़िम्मेदार इंसान मदद कर सकता है?
translated_text_en: No one from customer care is picking up the call. I have been listening to music for the last 2 hours. Can any responsible person help?
reply: कॉल वेटिंग समय अधिक होने के लिए क्षमा करें। हमने आपके लिए कॉल-बैक शेड्यूल कर दिया है।

complaint_text: Pichhle 13 dino se main isi issue ke chakkar mein hoon aur ab bahut frustration ho raha hai. ₹12880 mere liye chhoti amount nahi hai aur iska aise atak jana bahut stressful hai. Customer care ko 2 baar call kiya, har baar sirf bola jata hai 24–48 hours wait karo. Ye sab dekh kar bahut gussa aur disappointment ho raha hai, please jaldi resolve karo. complaint_text: मैंने 12 दिन पहले आपके ऐप से ऑर्डर किया था लेकिन अभी तक सही अपडेट नहीं मिला है। इस देरी की वजह से मुझे अतिरिक्त पैसा और समय दोनों लग रहे हैं। मैंने ऐप से शिकायत और ईमेल दोनों किए, लेकिन बस ऑटोमेटिक जवाब ही मिल रहे हैं। ऐसी सर्विस की मैंने उम्मीद नहीं की थी और मैं काफ़ी निराश हूँ। Mujhe lagta hai time par action nahi liya gaya to future mein bhi aise problems repeat honge. Mujhe lagta hai time par action nahi liya gaya to future mein bhi aise problems repeat honge.
translated_text_en: I have been facing this issue for around 12 days. An amount of ₹690 is involved and I have already contacted support 1 time(s) without a clear solution. This delay and confusion is causing a lot of stress and inconvenience.
reply: आपको हुई असुविधा के लिए हम माफ़ी चाहते हैं। हमने इसे अपनी लॉजिस्टिक्स टीम तक पहुँचा दिया है और सही ट्रैकिंग व समाधान की टाइमलाइन जल्द साझा करेंगे। आपके धैर्य और सहयोग के लिए धन्यवाद।

complaint_text: मेरा ऑर्डर अभी तक 'शिप्ड' दिखा रहा है जबकि डिलीवरी की तारीख कल की थी। लखनऊ में हमारे यहाँ कोई भी कॉल रिसीव नहीं कर रहा। मुझे ये पैकेट आज ही चाहिए।

complaint_text: मैंने 3 दिन पहले आपके ऐप से ऑर्डर किया था लेकिन अभी तक सही अपडेट नहीं मिला है। मैंने पूरा पेमेंट पहले ही कर दिया है लेकिन बदले में सही सर्विस नहीं मिल रही। मैंने ऐप से शिकायत और ईमेल दोनों किए, लेकिन बस ऑटोमेटिक जवाब ही मिल रहे हैं। कृपया इसको प्रायोरिटी पर लेकर सही समाधान दें।

complaint_text: मेरे घर का पता सही होने के बावजूद डिलीवरी वाला बोल रहा है कि एड्रेस नहीं मिल रहा। पिछले तीन दिनों से वो यही बहाना बना रहा है और मेरा सामान वापस भेज दिया। कृपया किसी और को भेजें जो मैप देख सके और काम चोरी न करे।

Please look into this on priority and give me a proper resolution.
